original_text: And David enquired of the Lord, saying, Shall I go up to the Philistines? wilt thou deliver them into mine hand? And the Lord said unto David, Go up: for I will doubtless deliver the Philistines into thine hand.
korean_text: 다윗이 여호와께 여쭈어 이르되 내가 블레셋 사람에게로 올라가리이까 여호와께서 그들을 내 손에 넘기시겠나이까 하니 여호와께서 다윗에게 말씀하시되 올라가라 내가 반드시 블레셋 사람을 네 손에 넘기리라 하신지라

sentences.original_text: And David enquired of the Lord
saying, Shall I go up to the Philistines?
wilt thou deliver them into mine hand?
And the Lord said unto David
for I will doubtless deliver the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 반드시 블레셋 사람을 네 손에 붙이리라
